verses.verse: <S%G1223><s%> Therefore, <S%G5124><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1248><s%> This Service, <S%G3778><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> We Received Mercy, <S%G1653><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Faint Not. <S%G1573><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> We Renounced <S%G550><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hidden Things <S%G2927><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Shame, <S%G152><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Walking <S%G4043><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Craftiness, <S%G3834><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Falsifying <S%G1389><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Manifestation <S%G5321><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Commending <S%G4921><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Conscience <S%G4893><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Covered <S%G2572><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Perishing <S%G622><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Covered; <S%G2572><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> Of This Age <S%G5127><s%> Blinded <S%G5186><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thoughts <S%G3540><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Unbelieving, <S%G571><s%> So As <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Beam Forth <S%G826><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Radiancy <S%G5462><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The Image <S%G1504><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> Do We Proclaim, <S%G2784><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> <S%G1438><s%> And Ourselves <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1401><s%> Your Bondmen <S%G5216><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Because It Is <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Spoke <S%G2036><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> To Shine, <S%G2989><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Shone <S%G2989><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Our Hearts <S%G2257><s%> For The <S%G4314><s%> Radiancy <S%G5462><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

<S%G2192><s%> But We Have <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2344><s%> This Treasure <S%G5126><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Earthen <S%G3749><s%> Vessels, <S%G4632><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Surpassingness <S%G5236><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> May Be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Us : <S%G2257><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Every Way <S%G3956><s%> Oppressed, <S%G2346><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Straitened; <S%G4729><s%> Perplexed, <S%G639><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Utterly At A Loss; <S%G1820><s%>
Persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Forsaken; <S%G1459><s%> Cast Down, <S%G2598><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Destroyed; <S%G622><s%>

Always <S%G3842><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dying <S%G3500><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Bearing About, <S%G4064><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> May Be Manifested; <S%G5319><s%>

<S%G104><s%> For Always <S%G1063><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Live <S%G2198><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> Are Delivered <S%G3860><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> May Be Manifested <S%G5319><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mortal <S%G2349><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Our; <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G2192><s%> And Having <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Faith, <S%G4102><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> What <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Written, <S%G1125><s%> I Believed, <S%G4100><s%> Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I Spoke; <S%G2980><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Believe, <S%G4100><s%> Therefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Speak; <S%G2980><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Raised Up <S%G1453><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Will Raise Up, <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Present <S%G3936><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> All Things Are <S%G3956><s%> ' For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Abounding <S%G4121><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Most, <S%G4119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> May Cause To Exceed <S%G4052><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G3756><s%> , We Faint Not; <S%G1573><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Indeed <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Outward <S%G1854><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Is Being Brought To Decay, <S%G1311><s%> ' Yet <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inward <S%G2081><s%> Is Being Renewed <S%G341><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Day By Day. <S%G2250><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Momentary <S%G3910><s%> Lightness <S%G1645><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> <S%G2257><s%> ' Our <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G1519><s%> Excessively Surpassing <S%G5236><s%> An Eternal <S%G166><s%> Weight <S%G922><s%> Of Glory <S%G1391><s%> Works Out <S%G2716><s%> For Us; <S%G2254><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Considering <S%G4648><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Seen, <S%G991><s%> But <S%G235><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Seen; <S%G991><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The Things <S%G1063><s%> Seen Are <S%G991><s%> Temporary, <S%G4340><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The Things <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Seen <S%G991><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>
